name: ModLanguagePack
title: Language pack for mods
author: sherlockholmes221b
description: It's a mod language pack. It provides no game changes, just the localization for as many mods as possible. The version will always stay 1.0.0. Mod will be updated every week, if possible. GitHub repo is fully editable for those who want to contribute. Let's make this the largest Factorio dictionary ever!
